description.p: Alpha Anywhere allows you to backup your desktop application with a single menu selections by selecting the Tools, Backup/Restore Database, One-step Backup command. Before you can run a one-step backup, you must first have saved backup settings.

step.description: On the Desktop Control Panel, select Tools > Backup/Restore Database > Backup Database... .
Make your selections on the dialog.
To run the one-step backup, select Tools > Backup/Restore Database > One-step Backup.

section.description: You can also run One-Step Backup from Xbasic using the Onestep_Backup() command.

page.limitations: Desktop applications only. Not available in Community Edition.
